SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, M.* FROM ( SELECT userNo, userId, userPw, userNick, userEmail, userName, userPhone, userPostcode, userAdd1, userAdd2, businessNo FROM member ORDER BY userNo DESC ) M ) member
rnum BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM ( SELECT B.SUBNO, B.USERNO AS BEANSUB_USERNO, B.BEANNO, B.GRAM, B.PRICE, B.GRIND, B.SUBSTARTDATE, B.SUBENDDATE, B.SUBTIME, B.NONSUB, M.USERNO AS MEMBER_USERNO, M.USERADD1, M.USERADD2, M.USERNAME, B2.BEANNAME FROM BEANSUB B, "MEMBER" M, BEAN B2
AND B.USERNO = M.USERNO AND B.BEANNO = B2.BEANNO
ORDER BY B.SUBNO DESC ) B ) beansub
rnum BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
SELECT CASE WHEN NONSUB = 'N' THEN 'TRUE' ELSE 'FALSE' END AS RESULT FROM BEANSUB WHERE SUBNO = #{subNo}
